name: Dark Wordpress Admin
description: Make your wordpress admin really dark.
additional_info:
Changelog :

* 2.0 : Update by Fol de Dol (https://userstyles.org/users/343878)
* 1.9 : Media upload support
* 1.8 : Menu manager support
* 1.7 : plugin installer & updater
* 1.6 : support for custom fields
* 1.5 : fix in comments list
* 1.4 : support welcome panel
* 1.3 : Support login page
* 1.2 : Support screen options
* 1.1 : Support .update-nag
* 1.0 : Match all /wp-admin with regexp
* 0.3 : support customize page
* 0.2 : support more objects
* 0.1 : initial publish
